summary: My new favorite thing about watching Prisoner of Azkaban is that Petunia literally did nothing to help Marge when she started to...
body:
My new favorite thing about watching Prisoner of Azkaban is that Petunia literally did nothing to help Marge when she started to bloat and float away, and just kind of watched her go. Like “I can’t hear your screaming over the fact you just insulted my dead sister”

Reminds me of this deleted scene, that should have made the final cut

tags: anything's possible if queue have enough nerve
summary: I’ve been reading some posts about a desire for Tina having longer hair in the next Fantastic Beasts movie, and that got me...
body:
I’ve been reading some posts about a desire for Tina having longer hair in the next Fantastic Beasts movie, and that got me thinking: would this be accurate to the time (assuming the rumours are correct and it takes place in the 30s)? Okay, yeah, it’s an alternate history series with magic but I digress. It turns out…that longer hair in the 30s actually was in! You can learn some more over here. Perhaps as a way to escape the looming presence of The Great Depression (I’m really interested to see if the wizarding world was also impacted by this, despite the fact they use different currency), hair became a lot more elegant and had less of the flamboyance of the 20s.

So fellow Tina fans, it looks like the stars really have aligned!

summary:
Marauders edition
Sirius: From now on we’ll be using code names. You can call me ‘Eagle one’
Sirius: Marlene. Code name-‘been...
body:
Marauders edition


Sirius: From now on we’ll be using code names. You can call me ‘Eagle one’

Sirius: Marlene. Code name-‘been there done that’

Sirius: Remus is ‘Currently doing that’

Sirius: James is ‘Happened once in a dream’

Sirius: Dorcas. Code name-‘If I had to pick a girl’

Sirius: Lily is…’Eagle two’

Lily: Oh thank God.

summary:
Story: The Wolf Lord
https://www.fanfiction.net/s/12855468/1
The Wolf Lord » by Pentel123 Summer of 1993, Professor McGonagall...
body:
Story: The Wolf Lord

https://www.fanfiction.net/s/12855468/1

The Wolf Lord » by Pentel123 Summer of 1993, Professor McGonagall visits a small American town hunting the one man who might be able to help capture the escaped convict Sirius Black, and more importantly fill in as the DADA professor. There she meets a boy that disappeared eight years ago sparking a massive if fruitless manhunt for the missing Boy-Who-Lived. Werewolf!Harry with DAD!Remus

Harry Potter, M, English, Adventure & Humor, chapters: 31, words: 141k+, favs: 404, follows: 662, updated: Nov 12 published: Mar 2, Harry P., Remus L., Katie B., OC

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.
